name: Oath of Divine Justice
entries: Following the belief that all creatures fall under one law, Paladins of Divine Justice act as Judge,Jury and Executioner for those who dare break said law.
Paladins under the Oath of Divine Justice strike forth with Holy Fire, burning all evil in their path to a perfect world, at any cost.

entries.subclassFeature: Oath of Divine Justice Spells|Paladin|PHB|Divine Justice|TftJC|3
